name: Lost Hero (itch) (freehotdog)
description:
Controls:

Move - W A S D
Pause - ESC

Overview:

Reach LVL 10 to escape. In this "dungeon-crawler", you are fighting for your safety through an endless stream of creatures and collectables. Strengthen your hero in different ways, make the correct moves or suffer the consequences!

Before You Play:

This game is playable, but unfinished. At the moment, ATK and DEF are meaningless as well as collecting chests, working on this currently. Any feedback regarding game direction or bugs you encounter is greatly appreciated, thanks!

Planned Updates:
  • Balancing the spawn rate of enemies/items/empty spaces, right now you can get lucky and button mash through the game
  • Volume adjust
  • Original Music
  • Different enemies
  • More collectables

Music is sourced from OpenGameArt

Developed by Matt and Jeremy Smith for MFGJ2020
